local p local u local m
function startup(lul_device) luup.log("SensorMqtt: Loading plugin module L_SensorMqtt1 ...") if (package.path:find ("/etc/cmh-ludl/?.lua;/etc/cmh-lu/?.lua", 1, true) == nil) then package.path = package.path .. ";/etc/cmh-ludl/?.lua;/etc/cmh-lu/?.lua" end
package.loaded.L_SensorMqtt1 = nil p = require("L_SensorMqtt1") if (package.loaded.L_SensorMqtt1 == nil) then luup.log("SensorMqtt: Plugin is not installed correctly. Library L_SensorMqtt1 cannot be loaded.", 1) luup.task("Plugin not correctly installed", 2, "SensorMqtt plugin", -1) return false end luup.log("SensorMqtt: Plugin module L_SensorMqtt1 loaded")
return p.startup(lul_device) end
